text:
How can I place a 3D axis in a `Figure`?
For example
```vx = -1:0.01:1
vy = -1:0.01:1

f(x, y) = (sin(x * 10) + cos(y * 10)) / 4
fig = Figure()
ax1 = fig[1, 1] = Axis(fig, title = "surface")
ax2 = fig[1, 2] = Axis(fig, title = "contour3d")
surface!(ax1, vx, vy, f)
contour3d!(ax2, vx, vy, (x, y) -> f(x, y), levels=15, linewidth=3)
fig```
gives a 2D plot
